text: thank you <@U8249TTCK>! Can’t believe I overlooked that! Annoying that they haven’t given the option to override this in the module settings though…

The "Improved file property experience" is breaking dynamic content modules when trying to display images. When I pull the object property data in using the HubL crm_objects() function, the new file properties just return an id number that seems useless for displaying the image that has been uploaded to the file property.

Yet another HubSpot "improvement" that is breaking critical portions of a client site and hurting their trust in us :face_with_rolling_eyes:
